entry.title: Document Splitting ‚Äì Overflow Error after Changes in Business Transaction Variant 0000/0001
entry.content:
I have a document splitting issue where additional categories were assigned in the business transaction and transaction variant 0000/0001 for the GRN (Goods Receipt Note) process.

After this, the system started throwing "Document Splitting causes field overflow for currency type Quantity - GLT0004". SAP recommends reverting the configuration to the standard settings, but I am not sure about the impacts of doing so or the best approach to perform this adjustment.

Could anyone please assist or share guidance on how to proceed?

entry.title: Seeking Guidance on Configuring Access for Vendor Transactions in S4HANA Public Cloud System
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

We have four users with specific roles and restrictions:

User A:
- Can post entries for a specific vendor.
- Needs access to all postings and reports related to that vendor.

User B:
- No access to any data related to the vendor managed by User A.

User C:
- Can make payments for all vendors except the one managed by User A.
- Vendor managed by User A should not be visible in any payment applications.

User üòß
- Can make payments only for the vendor managed by User A.

Applications in use include:
- Maintain Business Partner
- Create Supplier Invoice Advance
- Manage Supplier Line Item
- Display Supplier Balance
- Manage Automatic Payment
- Display Journal Entries (with respect to vendor)
- Supplier Down Payment
- Post Outgoing Payment

Could you please suggest ways to configure these settings and meet the requirements?

entry.title: How to switch off message no AA577 enter trading partner
entry.content:
Dear SAP Support,

By using TC- ABAVN (Asset Retirement by scarping), ABAON (Asset Retirement without Customer) or ABUMN (Asset Transfer) and etc. system asking warning message "Enter trading partner".

I have also checked Document type (A*), there is selected the "Inter-company postgs." or "Enter trading part." indicator or both is set for the document type used.

I have an additional question. Can I change the text message displayed on the tab bar below?

Could You Please tell me how to solve this error.

Regards,

Ms. Phattharawadee Burachiraroj (Ying)

entry.title: Capitalization date must be earlier than or same as transfer date.
entry.content:
Hi All,

I am encountering an error while uploading the Asset Master through the Migration Cockpit in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud. The system is not allowing me to change the Legacy Transfer Date.

I am receiving the following message while uploading the template:
"At least one capitalization date must be earlier than or the same as the transfer date 2025-03-31."

Could you please help me with a solution for this issue?

 

Thank you.

Finance_ Asset Accounting_ SAP S4HANA PUBLIC CLOUD

entry.title: Advice on Payment Term Configuration in OBB8
entry.content:
Hi SAP experts,

I have question on how to achieve these scenarios from OBB8 configuration:

1. Invoice dated 15 August 2025 with document due on 31.10.2025 and paid in F110 on 31 October 2025 - Entitle for % discount (Pass)
2. Invoice dated 15 July 2025 with document due on 30.09.2025 and paid in F110 on 31 October 2025 - Not entitle for discount (Failed - SAP still showing discount for this document)
3. Invoice dated 15 October 2025 - Shouldn't appear in F110 payment listing (Pass)
 
I have set configuration Payment term Z061:
Term 1: Percentage (1.5%) / Fixed Date (31) / Additional Months (2) - which is failed at 2nd scenario.
 
From my understanding, this vendor only has 1 term.
Due date must always EOM + 2 Months together with discount. If the document is paid after due, no discount should apply at F110.

entry.title: F150 Mahndruck Sprache Standardtexte
entry.content:
Hallo SAP-Support,

wir suchen nach einer M√∂glichkeit die Sprache f√ºr die Standardtexts zu beeinflussen und von KNA1 abzuweichen. Eine analoge Logik wie in 2632165 w√§re ideal:

  1. Empf√§ngersprache (KNA1)
  2. Englisch
  3. Anmeldesprache
  4. Sprache des Textes, wenn dieser nur in einer einzigen Sprache vorhanden ist

Wir nutzen PRINT_DUNNING_NOTICE_SF und wollen in einem Mahnverfahren nur in DE oder EN kommunizieren und die Texte auch nur in diesen beiden Sprachen pflegen.

Vielen Dank!

entry.title: Issue with Automatic Payments
entry.content:
Problem Description
We are currently experiencing issues with the execution of automatic and single payments in SAP. Despite reviewing and adjusting the corresponding configuration, the problem persists. The only temporary solution has been to manually reassign the payable account to each vendor, which is not the expected system behavior, as it should follow the defined hierarchy and execute the payment automatically.

Error Details
When attempting to execute an automatic payment for company code 4802 (Molino San Gerardo) using bank BCOL/1645, the system displays the following error message:

‚ÄúHouse bank BCOL/1645 is not assigned to G/L account 11101020 in company code 4802.‚Äù

Account 11101020 does not belong to company code 4802 and is not included in the configuration, as confirmed during the review.

This same behavior occurs in other company codes, where the system attempts to use accounts that are not correctly assigned, resulting in similar errors.

Analysis Performed
The following reviews and tests were conducted:

  • Bank G/L accounts: Verified that the G/L accounts assigned to banks for company code 4802 are correctly configured and do not include account 11101020
  • House bank to G/L account assignment: Confirmed that house bank BCOL/1645 is linked to the correct G/L account and not to 11101020.
  • Bank determination for payments: Reviewed the configuration of bank determination for payments, confirming that company code 4802 and house bank BCOL/1645 are correctly parameterized, with no assignment to account 11101020.
    • Search for company code 4802 and house bank BCOL/1645.
    • No assignment to account 11101020 was found.
  • Tests in other company codes: When replicating the process in other company codes, similar errors were obtained, indicating that the issue is not exclusive to one company code.

Temporary Solution Applied
To execute the payment, it is currently necessary to manually assign the bank data in the vendor master record before processing the payment. However, this procedure is not viable for daily operations, as it requires manual intervention for each invoice to be paid.

Additionally, the payment is executed but impacts the statement account instead of the outgoing payment account.It posts to the account ending in 10, whereas it should post to the one ending in 12.

Support Request
We kindly request your support in identifying and correcting the root cause of this behavior so that the system performs automatic payments correctly, following the defined configuration hierarchy and without requiring manual intervention for each invoice.

Your prompt response would be greatly appreciated, as we are about to begin the integration testing phase.

entry.title: Exploring AI in the ERP Ecosystem ‚Äì Especially in the SAP FICO Space
entry.content:
Hi Everyone,

I wanted to start an open discussion on how Artificial Intelligence (AI) is shaping the ERP ecosystem, especially in the SAP FICO area.

We all can see that automation and intelligence are becoming core to financial operations ‚Äî from predictive accounting to intelligent reconciliations, cash forecasting, anomaly detection, and even automated decision support.

But I‚Äôm curious to hear from everyone here:

  • How do you see AI blending with traditional FICO processes?

  • What are the most promising areas for AI-driven improvements in Finance and Controlling?

  • Are there real examples where AI has already made a visible impact in your projects?

No specific questions here ‚Äî just an open space for sharing ideas, thoughts, experiences, and even challenges you‚Äôve faced while exploring or implementing AI capabilities in ERP or FICO.

Looking forward to hearing your perspectives and insights!

Best regards,
Eswar Nekkalapu
